auth.signupSubTitle: Join us and start your journey

first.title: Be Respectful to Others
first.description: Treat all community members with kindness, respect, and dignity. No harassment, bullying, or discriminatory behavior will be tolerated.

second.title: No Dating or Flirty Behavior
second.description: This platform is designed for friendship and cultural exchange only. Romantic advances or dating requests are not appropriate.

third.title: No In-Person Meetings
third.description: For your safety, do not arrange to meet other users in person. Keep all interactions within the app's safe environment.

fourth.title: Protect Personal Information
fourth.description: Never share personal details like your full name, address, phone number, financial information, or other sensitive data.

fifth.title: Use Appropriate Language
fifth.description: Keep conversations clean and family-friendly. Profanity, explicit content, or offensive language is strictly prohibited.

sixth.title: Report Inappropriate Behavior
sixth.description: If you encounter any violations of these guidelines, please report them immediately to help maintain a safe community.

seventh.title: Be Authentic
seventh.description: Use your real photos and provide honest information about yourself. Fake profiles and catfishing are not allowed.

eighth.title: Respect Cultural Differences
eighth.description: Embrace diversity and be open to learning about different cultures, traditions, and perspectives with an open mind.

ninth.title: No Spam or Self-Promotion
ninth.description: Don't send repetitive messages, advertisements, or promote external services, websites, or social media accounts.

tenth.title: Keep Conversations Meaningful
tenth.description: Engage in genuine conversations focused on friendship, language learning, and cultural exchange rather than superficial interactions.

eleventh.title: Respect Privacy Settings
eleventh.description: Honor other users' privacy preferences and boundaries. Don't pressure anyone to share more than they're comfortable with.

twelfth.title: No Commercial Activities
twelfth.description: This platform is not for business transactions, selling products, or any commercial activities. Keep interactions social and friendly.

thirteenth.title: Use Features Responsibly
thirteenth.description: Use all app features as intended. Don't exploit or misuse any functionality for purposes other than genuine friendship building.

fourteenth.title: Be Patient with Language Learners
fourteenth.description: Show understanding and patience when communicating with users who are learning your language. Help them improve with kindness.

fifteenth.title: No Hate Speech or Discrimination
fifteenth.description: Any form of hate speech, racism, sexism, or discrimination based on religion, nationality, or personal characteristics is forbidden.

sixteenth.title: Maintain Age-Appropriate Interactions
sixteenth.description: Ensure all conversations and shared content are appropriate for users of all ages in our diverse community.

seventeenth.title: No Sharing of External Contacts
seventeenth.description: Don't share or request external contact information like email, social media handles, or messaging app details.

eighteenth.title: Respect Time Zones and Availability
eighteenth.description: Be mindful that users are from different time zones. Don't expect immediate responses and respect others' availability.

nineteenth.title: Keep Photos Appropriate
nineteenth.description: Share only appropriate, non-suggestive photos. Profile pictures should clearly show your face and be suitable for all audiences.

twentieth.title: Follow Local Laws
twentieth.description: Ensure all your activities on the platform comply with local laws and regulations in your country and region.
